import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FiDollarSign, FiClock, FiPlusCircle } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; const Wallet = ({ user, onAddFunds }) => { const [amount, setAmount] = useState(1000); const [isAdding, setIsAdding] = useState(false); const walletHistory = [ { date: 'Jan', balance: 45000 }, { date: 'Feb', balance: 42000 }, { date: 'Mar', balance: 48000 }, { date: 'Apr', balance: 46000 }, { date: 'May', balance: 50000 }, { date: 'Jun', balance: user.walletBalance }, ]; const recentTransactions = [ { type: 'debit', amount: 2500, description: 'Flight Booking - FL012', date: '2024-06-15' }, { type: 'credit', amount: 10000, description: 'Wallet Top-up', date: '2024-06-10' }, { type: 'debit', amount: 2800, description: 'Flight Booking - FL008', date: '2024-06-05' }, { type: 'debit', amount: 2200, description: 'Flight Booking - FL005', date: '2024-05-28' }, { type: 'credit', amount: 5000, description: 'Wallet Top-up', date: '2024-05-25' }, ]; const handleAddFunds = async () => { if (amount <= 0) { alert('Please enter a valid amount'); return; } setIsAdding(true); const success = await onAddFunds(amount); setIsAdding(false); if (success) { setAmount(1000); } }; return (

setAmount(parseInt(e.target.value) || 0)} min="100" step="100" className="input-field" placeholder="Enter amount" />

Quick Tips

  • • Minimum top-up amount is ₹100
  • • Funds are added instantly
  • • Wallet balance never expires
  • • Get 5% bonus on ₹5000+ top-ups
); }; export default Wallet;
